title: The provisions of the DC Rules for Greater Mumbai, and all other applicable sections of the MA & TP Act, 1966, shall apply mutatis mutandis to the development of land with the modification that the expressions "MCGM" and "Municipal Commissioner" shall be substituted by the expressions "SRA" and "OSD, DRP (SRA)” respectively
clause_text: The provisions of the DC Rules for Greater Mumbai, and all other applicable sections of the MA & TP Act, 1966, shall apply mutatis mutandis to the development of land with the modification that the expressions "MCGM" and "Municipal Commissioner" shall be substituted by the expressions "SRA" and "OSD, DRP (SRA)” respectively.
section: amenities and facilities to be provided under DRPto be read with clause 7.1 of Regulation no. 33 (10) (A):
